verses.verse: On that day <S%H3117><s%> they read <S%H7121><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the audience <S%H241><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>; and therein was found <S%H4672><s%> written <S%H3789><s%>, that an Ammonite <S%H5984><s%> and a Moabite <S%H4125><s%> should not enter <S%H935><s%> into the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>,

because they met <S%H6923><s%> not the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> with bread <S%H3899><s%> and with water <S%H4325><s%>, but hired <S%H7936><s%> Balaam <S%H1109><s%> against them <S%H7043><s%>, to curse them <S%H430><s%>: howbeit our God turned <S%H2015><s%> the curse <S%H7043><s%> into a blessing <S%H1293><s%>.
And it came to pass <S%H8085><s%>, when they had heard the law <S%H8451><s%>, that they separated <S%H914><s%> from Israel <S%H3478><s%> all the mixed multitude <S%H6154><s%>.

Now before <S%H6440><s%> this <S%H475><s%>, Eliashib the priest <S%H3548><s%>, who was appointed <S%H5414><s%> over the chambers <S%H3957><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>, being allied <S%H7138><s%> unto Tobiah <S%H2900><s%>,

But in all this time I was not at Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>; for in the two <S%H8147><s%> and thirtieth <S%H7970><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Artaxerxes <S%H783><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> I went <S%H935><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%>: and after <S%H7093><s%> certain days <S%H3117><s%> asked I leave <S%H7592><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%>,

and I came <S%H935><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, and understood <S%H995><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> that Eliashib <S%H475><s%> had done <S%H6213><s%> for Tobiah <S%H2900><s%>, in preparing <S%H6213><s%> him a chamber <S%H5393><s%> in the courts <S%H2691><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>.

And it grieved <S%H3415><s%> me sore <S%H3966><s%>: therefore I cast forth <S%H7993><s%> all the household <S%H1004><s%> stuff <S%H3627><s%> of Tobiah <S%H2900><s%> out of <S%H2351><s%> the chamber <S%H3957><s%>.

Then I commanded <S%H559><s%>, and they cleansed <S%H2891><s%> the chambers <S%H3957><s%>: and thither brought I again <S%H7725><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, with the meal-offerings <S%H4503><s%> and the frankincense <S%H3828><s%>.

And I perceived <S%H3045><s%> that the portions <S%H4521><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> had not been given <S%H5414><s%> them <S%H3881><s%>; so that the Levites and the singers <S%H7891><s%>, that did <S%H6213><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%>, were fled <S%H1272><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> to his field <S%H7704><s%>.

Then contended <S%H7378><s%> I with the rulers <S%H5461><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Why is the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> forsaken <S%H5800><s%>? And I gathered them together <S%H6908><s%>, and set <S%H5975><s%> them in their place <S%H5977><s%>.
Then brought <S%H935><s%> all Judah <S%H3063><s%> the tithe <S%H4643><s%> of the grain <S%H1715><s%> and the new wine <S%H8492><s%> and the oil <S%H3323><s%> unto the treasuries <S%H214><s%>.

And I made treasurers <S%H686><s%> over the treasuries <S%H214><s%>, Shelemiah <S%H8018><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and Zadok <S%H6659><s%> the scribe <S%H5608><s%>, and of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, Pedaiah <S%H6305><s%>: and next to them <S%H3027><s%> was Hanan <S%H2605><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zaccur <S%H2139><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Mattaniah <S%H4983><s%>; for they were counted <S%H2803><s%> faithful <S%H539><s%>, and their business was to distribute <S%H2505><s%> unto their brethren <S%H251><s%>.

Remember <S%H2142><s%> me <S%H430><s%>, O my God, concerning this <S%H4229><s%>, and wipe not out my good <S%H2617><s%> deeds that I have done <S%H6213><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of my God <S%H430><s%>, and for the observances thereof <S%H4929><s%>.

In those days <S%H3117><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> I in Judah <S%H3063><s%> some men treading <S%H1869><s%> wine-presses <S%H1660><s%> on the sabbath <S%H7676><s%>, and bringing in <S%H935><s%> sheaves <S%H6194><s%>, and lading <S%H6006><s%> asses <S%H2543><s%> therewith <S%H3196><s%>; as also wine, grapes <S%H6025><s%>, and figs <S%H8384><s%>, and all manner of burdens <S%H4853><s%>, which they brought <S%H935><s%> into Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> on the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>: and I testified <S%H5749><s%> against them in the day <S%H3117><s%> wherein they sold <S%H4376><s%> victuals <S%H6718><s%>.

There dwelt <S%H3427><s%> men of Tyre <S%H6876><s%> also therein <S%H935><s%>, who brought in fish <S%H1709><s%>, and all manner of wares <S%H4377><s%>, and sold <S%H4376><s%> on the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

Then I contended <S%H7378><s%> with the nobles <S%H2715><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H7451><s%>, What evil thing <S%H1697><s%> is this that ye do <S%H6213><s%>, and profane <S%H2490><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>?

Did <S%H6213><s%> not your fathers <S%H1><s%> thus <S%H935><s%>, and did not our God <S%H430><s%> bring <S%H935><s%> all this evil <S%H7451><s%> upon us <S%H5892><s%>, and upon this city? yet ye bring <S%H935><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> wrath <S%H2740><s%> upon Israel <S%H3478><s%> by profaning <S%H2490><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%>.

And it came to pass that <S%H8179><s%>, when the gates of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> began to be dark <S%H6751><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%>, I commanded <S%H559><s%> that the doors <S%H1817><s%> should be shut <S%H5462><s%>, and commanded <S%H559><s%> that they should not be opened <S%H6605><s%> till after <S%H310><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%>: and some of my servants <S%H5288><s%> set <S%H5975><s%> I over the gates <S%H8179><s%>, that there should no burden <S%H4853><s%> be brought in <S%H935><s%> on the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

So the merchants <S%H7402><s%> and sellers <S%H4376><s%> of all kind of wares <S%H4465><s%> lodged <S%H3885><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> once <S%H6471><s%> or twice <S%H8147><s%>.

Then I testified <S%H5749><s%> against them <S%H559><s%>, and said unto them <S%H3885><s%>, Why lodge ye about <S%H5048><s%> the wall <S%H2346><s%>? if ye do so again <S%H8138><s%>, I will lay <S%H7971><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%> on you <S%H6256><s%>. From that time forth came <S%H935><s%> they no more on the sabbath <S%H7676><s%>.

And I commanded <S%H559><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> that they should purify <S%H2891><s%> themselves <S%H935><s%>, and that they should come and keep <S%H8104><s%> the gates <S%H8179><s%>, to sanctify <S%H6942><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>. Remember <S%H2142><s%> unto me <S%H430><s%>, O my God, this also <S%H2347><s%>, and spare me according to the greatness <S%H7230><s%> of thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>.

In those days <S%H3117><s%> also saw <S%H7200><s%> I the Jews <S%H3064><s%> that had married <S%H3427><s%> women <S%H802><s%> of Ashdod <S%H796><s%>, of Ammon <S%H5984><s%>, and of Moab <S%H4125><s%>:

Did not Solomon <S%H8010><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> sin <S%H2398><s%> by these things <S%H7227><s%>? yet among many nations <S%H1471><s%> was there no king <S%H4428><s%> like him <S%H157><s%>, and he was beloved of his God <S%H430><s%>, and God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H5414><s%> him king <S%H4428><s%> over all Israel <S%H3478><s%>: nevertheless even him <S%H1571><s%> did foreign <S%H5237><s%> women <S%H802><s%> cause to sin <S%H2398><s%>.

Shall we then hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto you to do <S%H6213><s%> all this great <S%H1419><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%>, to trespass <S%H4603><s%> against our God <S%H430><s%> in marrying <S%H3427><s%> foreign <S%H5237><s%> women <S%H802><s%>?
